title: 2021 Mid-Year U.S. Economic Outlook: Growth Remains Strong
description: Despite some inflation and labor market risks, the outlook for the rest of the year anticipates strong growth in the U.S. economy. Chief U.S. Economist Ellen Zentner discusses with Andrew Sheets.
itunes:title: 2021 Mid-Year U.S. Economic Outlook: Growth Remains Strong
